page.title: 15Local views on the airport
page.content:
KIRMINGTON AIRPORT (HUMBERSIDE)
Several local businessmen find it extremely useful. Generally happy with the size of the airport at the moment but people are afraid of further developments. Some feel that ratepayers money has been wasted by the local council. It has made houses more difficult to sell in Kirmington. Local farmers have lost valuable farming land and fear loss of even more. Most people do not feel there is much scope for further expansion. Many people of the village have used the holiday flights to Jersey.
